attributes.additional_details:
This petition is concerning that all diabetics need larger Sharp Boxes in their homes...some people in  the UK are allowed large boxes and others are only allowed 1 litre boxes...its not nice trying to put used insulin pump equipment parts into it with a pen.Some GPs and Health Authorities do not allow more an 1 litre ones.

We need about 10,000 signatures..before it goes to parliment
